text: They’re horrible! They take way too long for the authentication process, then they canceled my order after it was authenticated! Will never purchase with them again!

author: shawn
text: Waited for SEVERAL days for my Veefrinds box that I bought for 7K to show any form of movement. StockX says they will find you the same product if the is an issue however since the boxes more than doubled in that time they just refunded me my 7K and very minimal customer service.
title: Waited for SEVERAL days for my…

author: Michael
text:
STILL WAITING
My order was confirmed and paid for 17 days ago on day 11 after purchase I was informed my product was being delayed.

I have paid over $400 for a pair of shoes and to be honest I am starting to get alittle nervous due to the product not even being received by StockX for checking and sending that I may not be getting anything?

Still 4 more stages before I get my product sent to me I guess we’ll see how many more days I’ll have to wait….I haven’t been given an indication of when I should expect my order….

Not sure I would go through this process again. Guess I’ll just keep waiting 

Order #34999883-34899642
title: STILL WAITING

author: Francisco JOR da Silva
text:
No information after payment. Delay on update info immediately after payment, why? Get a payment? Yes, so issue a receipt to prove so. After that send info about delivery.... And don't say 5 days to delivery and after nothing....
Only dark.
title: No information after payment

author: Anonymous
text: When they were verifying my shoes they took the sole out and carelessly put it back in and creased it. I contacted them about it and all they would give me for compensation is $50. Definitely not buying from here again.
title: Verification damaged my shoes

author: CRBW
text:
Processing Fees
I am disappointed in 4 things:
(1) You can only order one item at a time (You can't combine offers.)
(2) Every order has an extra *Processing Fee*. * Why?  Sneaky!  What is the purpose for that "fee"?  
(3) If you place more than one order, there's a *Processing Fee* for each order!
(4) The *higher* the item *cost*, the *higher* the *Processing Fee*!  Looking at my orders, the *Processing Fee* seems to be based on the item *Price*, not size or weight.
title: Processing Fees

author: Auther
text: Placed an order a week ago. Received no information on the status.  Had to reach out to stock x to find out the seller still hasn't shipped the item. Still waiting for a conclusion here.
title: Placed an order a week ago

author: CHRISTOPHER OLIVER
text: This is the second time to buy shoes from your service. The first time the shoes never did show up and you eventually after a very long time refunded my money. My son convinced me to try you again and this time we did get the shoes in a timely however they are used smelly and have been worn outside before, THIS IS CRAZY!!
title: This is the second time to buy shoes…
